Class RequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.demo.RequestController

public class RequestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for Request objects.
    Author:
    Max Minard, Matthew Martin

      • getRequest

        @RequestMapping(path="/request/{id_request}",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public Request getRequest(@PathVariable(value="id_request")
                                                                                                                   java.lang.Integer id_request,
                                                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        API method to receive GET Http request and retrieve information of given request. Returns request information with given request id.
        Parameters:
        id_request - ID of request to find
        model - Model to save
        Returns:
        request Found request

      • createRequest

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                path="/request/new",
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public Request createRequest(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                           Request request)
        API method to receive POST Http request and creates a new request with the given request information. Saves the request to the server database. Returns created request.
        Parameters:
        request - Request to create
        Returns:
        request Created Request

      • updateRequest

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                path="/request/update/{id_users}",
                consumes="application/json")
 @ResponseBody
public Request updateRequest(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                         Request request,
                                                                                                                                                                         @PathVariable(value="id_users")
                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer id_users)
        API method to receive POST Http request and update the last updated id of a request with the given user id. Returns the updated information of the request from the server database.
        Parameters:
        request - Request to update
        id_users - User id of last updated
        Returns:
        request Updated request

      • getUserRequests

        @RequestMapping(path="/users/{id_users}/requests",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.Collection<Request> getUserRequests(@PathVariable(value="id_users")
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Integer id_users,
                                                                                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        API method to receive GET Http request and retrieve the information of all requests associated with the given user id. Returns the list of requests from the server database.
        Parameters:
        id_users - User id to find requests
        model - Model to use
        Returns:
        Collection of requests List of requests
